title: Scullion: A Dishwasher's Guide to Mistaken Identity
description: “As quirky and fresh as a D&D campaign with your best friends." – Ashley Poston, author of GeekerellaIn the celebrity-obsessed Timberwood Village, the lives of humble dishwashers Darlis and Mae are turned upside down when Darlis is mistaken for The Great Warrior and local celebrity, Riqa. Pursuing them are two troll siblings hoping for the payday of a huge ransom to break out on their own. By using their knowledge of Riqa’s book, The Fair Maiden’s Guide to Eating Your Captor for Breakfast, Darlis and Mae give the trolls a run for their money.
author: Jarad Greene
